Class ColorCorrect

java.lang.Object
it.disi.unitn.videocreator.filtergraph.filterchain.filters.Filter
it.disi.unitn.videocreator.filtergraph.filterchain.filters.videofilters.colorcorrect.ColorCorrect
public class ColorCorrect extends Filter
This class implements the "colorcorrect" video filter.
